You focus on your next chapter — I’ll handle the rest.

The market’s brutal right now.
 
Listings are scarce.
Buyers are hesitant.
And good agents—you know, the ones who care—are starting to ask:
 
“Is it even worth staying in this business?”
 
If that’s you, we get it.
You’re not alone. And no, you’re not crazy.
It’s one of the toughest markets in decades.
 
But here’s the truth:
The real estate team we test all our marketing with - Acree Brothers Realty - just passed 147 transactions this year.

That’s 76 LISTINGS and 71 BUYERS in this market.
 
We’re not saying that to brag.
We’re saying it because we want to show you what’s actually working.
 
No, we’re not sitting back and letting deals fall in our lap.
We’re doing the work:
Open houses. Circle prospecting. Calling Facebook leads.
But what’s driving the majority of our business—
isn’t strangers.
It’s relationships.
 
68 of those 147 transactions came from our sphere and referrals.
And the tool that’s helping us stay top-of-mind with those people?
 
A high-end, personally branded magazine that shows up every two months—
not as a sales pitch, but as a gift.
It’s consistent.
It’s valuable.
And it’s helping us earn trust and generate reciprocity with the people who already know us.
 
It’s not a magic bullet.
But in a market where most agents are invisible to their database—
this keeps us top-of-mind.
 
And it works.
 
If you want to see how we’re using it alongside everything else we’re doing,
we’ll show you.

To start, download PDF samples of our latest magazines by filling out the form. We'll send them right over to the email you provide.

If you're 55 OR OLDER and have over $100K in your 401(k) or IRA, your retirement plan is at risk of being wiped out in this recession. 

With A Tax-Deferred 401(k) or IRA:
❌ You have fees: whether you know it or not you have a handful of fees that are slowly draining your retirement savings.
❌ Your money is not liquid: you can’t access your money any time you want, and if you do, you’re fiscally penalized.
❌ Your money is not guaranteed and protected: the money in your 401(k) or IRA moves with the market, and has very limited downside protection
❌ If you live long enough, you will run out of money: eventually, you will run out of money once you begin to take out withdrawals.

With a Secure Retirement Account:
✅ You don’t have any plan fees: keep 100% of your hard earned money as you should.
✅ Your interest rate is predetermined: your money grows at the same yearly rate as when you opened your account— even if the market crashes.
✅ Your money is Liquid: all money put into and made in your account is cash—you can withdraw a certain percentage each year—at any time—without penalty.
✅ Your money is protected: regardless how the market performs, you will have the peace of mind knowing that you will never lose money and is 100% protected from all creditors. Creditor protection in 401(k)s and 403(b) accounts may be limited.
✅ Your money will last throughout your lifetime, and beyond: you can elect to maximize your income or set the account up to provide a legacy for your loved ones or a charity of your choice when you pass away.

Once you’ve set it up you will never need to worry about running out of the money you put into it during retirement. And there's a multitude of fiscal maneuvers you can perform with such account.
